mapper.insert: insert into cookpang.tbl_user (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_nickname, user_phone_number, user_email, user_address, user_gender) values(#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userEmail}, #{userAddress}, #{userGender})
mapper.select: select user_number from tbl_user where user_id = #{userId} and user_password = #{userPassword}
